column4: Ah now I see what I did wrong.. I used /dev/hdd1 and /dev/hdc1 instead of /dev/sdc1 and /dev/sdb1  , wonder what the difference is.. hmm..
typically hxx is ATA and sxx is SATA, though these days the distinction is blurred
ah.. that makes sense.. the 2 disks are actually ATA disks, but I seen in several places and docs referers to sata etc around the topic.. confusing..
